field.label: Script
field.tooltip:
Tips for the script:
- The imports come first (including of the extended class or interface);
- No namespace is needed only the class;
- If the base class does not have a parameterless contructor a constructor with at least the same parameters has to be created;
-The return of the script has to be the Type of the class created. ex.: return typeof(MyClass).

field.label: Status
field.tooltip:
The current status of the dynamic component on container:
- Will be Deployed: the component will be deployed on the next container reload;
- Outdated: the component is on container but not it's most current version, will be updated on next container reload;
- Up to Date: the component is on container and up to date;
- Will be Deployed: the component is on container but will be undeployed on next reload;
- Undeployed: the component is not on the container.
